name: Alien Dodge (ZeezBit Studios)
description:
Year 2769.

You're an one-eyed space pirate. In your journey through the vast region of space,
you encountered an alien plant. Upon exploring the plant your crew came
in contact with an unknown species. They brought  it back to the ship.

Unfortunately, this species feeds on people and leaves behind only the eyes
of its victims. Now you are a sentient eye floating through space and dodging other
dangerous life forms.

It's the last chance for your survival!
